ygData.subject: Box of Abu-Kar
ygData.msgSnippet: My level 1 ogre warrior was waiting for the Fear Plane to open up (They made the spawn insane now, stuff at zone, nasty...) and this group left me a few
ygData.messageBody:
My level 1 ogre warrior was waiting for the Fear Plane to open up (They made
the spawn insane now, stuff at zone, nasty...) and this group left me a few
spectre corpses, and I got the box!! It has 10 slots and reduces weight to
/0/! Check it out on EQ'lizer if you want, but anyways, I'm on Fennin Ro,
and would be willing to trade for some nice druid armor for my druid, or
maybe warrior stuff (Not Ogre though, I would make it wood elf...)...I don't
know, just make offers, hehe, I would like something good, because I /do/
know what this is worth to monks as I used to have one (I don't play it
currently but I still like the list), anyways, just thought I'd give you
guys first real crack at it (Except for the people that assumed I had one
when I asked what it was worth)...Anyways, I'm in Feerott with it, but I'm
sure I could get it to my nice wood elf druid to make it safer for you
guys...I'm not sure if big things can fit in it, but I had a scythe I put in
there and it fit...
